title: Earth and Human Activity S112
prompt: What word correctly completes the sentence?
description: Gloria’s experiment doesn’t establish how the pond in her experiment compares to other ponds in the area. To prove that the pond is polluted by nearby fertilizer, she would need to compare her data against another nearby pond that isn’t near similar fertilizer but is similar in other ways. This would give Gloria a ____________ to compare her experimental data against.
feedback: Gloria’s experiment only show that the test pond is eutrophic. While unusual, eutrophic ponds can occur in nature. To prove that the pond is polluted, Gloria will need to show that other nearby ponds are NOT eutrophic. This will show that eutrophic ponds are not a feature of the local ecosystem, and that something is causing this pond, in particular, to have a problem. This would support the idea that the pond is polluted.
